The Ninth Plague: Darkness

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w spread|strong="H5186"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* palpable \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.”
